Khonkolor::

Khonkolor barely avoided the axe "Hey Bongiovi"said the cat "You has 
nine lives as the cats, why don't you took a cat-beast mode?"


Khonkolor fired 13 times against Bongiovy

--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Bongiovi:
> 
> 
> 
> The lasers tore through Bongiovi's chest, tearing into one of his 
two hearts. 
>  Still alive, he raised his axe, firing off a laser beam at 
Khonkolor.
